properties.entry: SELECT TEAM_NO, TEAM_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS MATCH_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO AND SCORE > 0) AS WIN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO AND SCORE <= 0) AS LOSE, (SELECT SUM(SCORE) / COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS AVG FROM TEAMS T ORDER BY WIN DESC, AVG DESC
